landingSection.title: Together we elevate emergency medicine in Syria

aboutSection.title: Our Mission
aboutSection.description: SEMI is a volunteer-based effort founded by a group of Syrian physicians who practice in different countries around the world. The initiative aims to advance the field of Emergency Medicine (EM) in Syria and help in the post-conflict health care reconstruction.

footer.allRightsReserved: Â© 2025 Syrian Emergency Medicine Initiative. All rights reserved.

landingSection.title: Syrian Emergency Medicine Initiative
landingSection.description: Uniting Syrian physicians worldwide to restore, strengthen, and lead the future of emergency medicine in Syria.

missionSection.title: Our Mission
missionSection.description: SEMI is a volunteer-based effort founded by a group of Syrian physicians who practice in different countries around the world. The initiative aims to advance the field of Emergency Medicine (EM) in Syria and help in the post-conflict health care reconstruction.

objectivesSection.title: Our Objectives
objectivesSection.educateDescription: We strive to educate and inspire the next generation of emergency physicians in Syria by equipping them with the latest knowledge, essential skills, and core values that we acquired by practicing in modern health care systems, and we are working on transferring this knowledge to Syrian Emergency physicians. To this end, we plan to sponsor conferences, workshops, symposia, and a virtual learning platform. Moreover, we strive to create a curriculum and a training program for the paramedics, and Emergency technicians.
objectivesSection.integrationDescription: Our goal is to update and improve the training programs across the different health systems in Syria into a high-quality national curriculum for emergency medicine residents. This ensures improved education and equal training opportunities for all, fostering a comprehensive and inclusive medical training system throughout the country.
objectivesSection.networkDescription: Collaboration with other national and international groups and organizations who are interested in advancing health delivery and health education in Syria, and most importantly, coordinate with the Syrian Ministry of Health.

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
comingSoon.description: We are working hard to bring this page to you. Stay tuned!!
